events.name: Lithium extraction from geothermal or oilfield brines
events.wd_label: Lithium extraction from geothermal or oilfield brines
events.wd_description: For geothermal or oilfield brines to be a successful source of lithium, a proven direct lithium extraction (DLE) process is required. Various companies are testing different DLE approaches to extract lithium effectively.
events.description: For geothermal or oilfield brines to be a successful source of lithium, a proven direct lithium extraction (DLE) process is required. Various companies are testing different DLE approaches to extract lithium effectively.

events.name: DLE process
events.wd_description: Direct lithium extraction (DLE) involves letting brine flow through a lithium-bonding material using various processes to extract lithium.
events.description: Direct lithium extraction (DLE) involves letting brine flow through a lithium-bonding material using various processes to extract lithium.

events.name: Adsorption
events.wd_description: Adsorption is one of the processes used in DLE, where lithium ions are captured by a material that bonds with lithium.
events.description: Adsorption is one of the processes used in DLE, where lithium ions are captured by a material that bonds with lithium.

events.name: Ion-exchange
events.wd_description: Ion-exchange is another DLE process where lithium ions are exchanged with other ions in a material to capture lithium.
events.description: Ion-exchange is another DLE process where lithium ions are exchanged with other ions in a material to capture lithium.

events.name: Membrane-separation
events.wd_description: Membrane-separation involves using membranes to separate lithium ions from the brine.
events.description: Membrane-separation involves using membranes to separate lithium ions from the brine.

events.name: Solvent-extraction
events.wd_description: Solvent-extraction is a DLE process where solvents are used to extract lithium ions from the brine.
events.description: Solvent-extraction is a DLE process where solvents are used to extract lithium ions from the brine.

events.name: Companies testing DLE approaches
events.wd_description: Various companies are exploring and testing different approaches to direct lithium extraction to make the process viable and efficient.
events.description: Various companies are exploring and testing different approaches to direct lithium extraction to make the process viable and efficient.

events.name: Lithium carbonate or lithium hydroxide production
events.wd_label: Lithium carbonate or lithium hydroxide production
events.wd_description: After extraction, a polishing solution is used to refine the lithium, producing lithium carbonate or lithium hydroxide.
events.description: After extraction, a polishing solution is used to refine the lithium, producing lithium carbonate or lithium hydroxide.

events.name: Lithium carbonate
events.wd_description: Lithium carbonate is one of the end products of the DLE process, used in battery production.
events.description: Lithium carbonate is one of the end products of the DLE process, used in battery production.

events.name: Lithium hydroxide
events.wd_description: Lithium hydroxide is another end product of the DLE process, also used in battery production.
events.description: Lithium hydroxide is another end product of the DLE process, also used in battery production.
